subject: Boxing
Television
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: The expressed goal of Saturday night’s Floyd Mayweather-Oscar De La Hoya junior middleweight title bout is to shatter the record of 1.99 million pay-per-view buys.
snippet: The expressed goal of Saturday night’s Floyd Mayweather-Oscar De La Hoya junior middleweight title bout is to shatter the record of 1.99 million pay-per-view buys.
